## function_createModal
> **createModal**\<`Data`\>(`config`?): [`ModalWidget`](#modalwidget)\<`Data`\>

Defined in: [core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts:138](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L138)

Creates a new modal widget instance.

### Type Parameters

• **Data**

### Parameters

#### config?

`PropsConfig`\<[`ModalProps`](#modalprops)\<`Data`\>\>

config of the modal, either as a store or as an object containing values or stores.

### Returns

[`ModalWidget`](#modalwidget)\<`Data`\>

a new modal widget instance

## function_getModalDefaultConfig
> **getModalDefaultConfig**(): [`ModalProps`](#modalprops)\<`any`\>

Defined in: [core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts:129](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L129)

Retrieve a shallow copy of the default modal config

### Returns

[`ModalProps`](#modalprops)\<`any`\>

the default modal config

## interface_ModalApi
Defined in: [core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts:88](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L88)

Interface representing the API for a modal component.

### Type Parameters

• **Data**

The type of data associated with the modal.

### Properties

#### patch

> **patch**: (`parameters`) => `void`

Defined in: [core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts:92](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L92)

Method to change some modal properties.

Modify the parameter values, and recalculate the stores accordingly

##### Parameters

###### parameters

[`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`ModalProps`](#modalprops)\<`Data`\>\>

##### Returns

`void`

### Methods

#### close

> **close**(`result`?): `void`

Defined in: [core/src/components/modal/modal.ts:224](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L224)

Closes the modal with the given result.

##### Parameters

###### result?

`any`

result of the modal, as passed in the [result](#modalbeforecloseevent-result) property of the event passed to the
[onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event handler (and possibly changed by it) and resolved by the promise returned by the ModalApi.open\|open method.

##### Returns

`void`

***

#### open

> **open**(): [`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`any`\>

Defined in: [core/src/components/modal/modal.ts:231](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L231)

Opens the modal and returns a promise that is resolved when the modal is closed.
The resolved value is the result passed to the ModalApi.close\|close method and possibly changed by the
[onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event handler

##### Returns

[`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`any`\>

## interface_ModalBeforeCloseEvent
Defined in: [core/src/components/modal/modal.ts:82](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L82)

Type of the parameter of [onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose).

### Properties

#### cancel

> **cancel**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/components/modal/modal.ts:94](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L94)

Whether to cancel the close of the modal.
It can be changed from the [onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event handler.

***

#### result

> **result**: `any`

Defined in: [core/src/components/modal/modal.ts:88](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L88)

Result of the modal, which is the value passed to the ModalApi.close\|close method
and later resolved by the promise returned by the ModalApi.open\|open method.
If needed, it can be changed from the [onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event handler.

## constant_modalCloseButtonClick
> `const` **modalCloseButtonClick**: unique `symbol`

Defined in: [core/src/components/modal/modal.ts:32](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L32)

Value present in the [result](#modalbeforecloseevent-result) property of the [onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event
and returned by the ModalApi.open\|open method, when the modal is closed by a click on the close button.

## interface_ModalContext
Defined in: [core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts:16](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L16)

Represents the context for a modal component.

### Type Parameters

• **Data**

The type of data associated with the modal.

### Properties

#### api

> **api**: [`ModalApi`](#modalapi)\<`Data`\>

Defined in: [core/src/types.ts:75](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/types.ts#L75)

all the api functions to interact with the widget

***

#### directives

> **directives**: [`ModalDirectives`](#modaldirectives)

Defined in: [core/src/types.ts:71](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/types.ts#L71)

directives to be used on html elements in the template of the widget or in the slots

***

#### state

> **state**: [`ModalState`](#modalstate)\<`Data`\>

Defined in: [core/src/types.ts:88](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/types.ts#L88)

the state of the widget

## interface_ModalDirectives
Defined in: [core/src/components/modal/modal.ts:242](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L242)

Directives of the modal widget.

### Properties

#### backdropDirective

> **backdropDirective**: `Directive`

Defined in: [core/src/components/modal/modal.ts:251](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L251)

Directive to put on the backdrop DOM element.

***

#### backdropPortalDirective

> **backdropPortalDirective**: `Directive`

Defined in: [core/src/components/modal/modal.ts:261](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L261)

Portal directive to put on the backdrop DOM element.

***

#### closeButtonDirective

> **closeButtonDirective**: `Directive`

Defined in: [core/src/components/modal/modal.ts:266](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L266)

Directive that adds all the necessary attributes to the close button

***

#### dialogDirective

> **dialogDirective**: `Directive`

Defined in: [core/src/components/modal/modal.ts:270](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L270)

Directive to apply to the dialog element when using the native [HTMLDialogElement](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLDialogElement)

***

#### modalDirective

> **modalDirective**: `Directive`

Defined in: [core/src/components/modal/modal.ts:246](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L246)

Directive to put on the modal DOM element.

***

#### modalPortalDirective

> **modalPortalDirective**: `Directive`

Defined in: [core/src/components/modal/modal.ts:256](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L256)

Portal directive to put on the modal DOM element.

## constant_modalOutsideClick
> `const` **modalOutsideClick**: unique `symbol`

Defined in: [core/src/components/modal/modal.ts:26](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L26)

Value present in the [result](#modalbeforecloseevent-result) property of the [onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event
and returned by the ModalApi.open\|open method, when the modal is closed by a click inside the viewport but outside the modal.

## interface_ModalProps
Defined in: [core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts:67](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L67)

Interface representing the properties for a modal component.

### Type Parameters

• **Data**

The type of data that the modal will handle.

### Properties

#### animated

> **animated**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/components/modal/modal.ts:106](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L106)

Whether the modal and its backdrop (if present) should be animated when shown or hidden.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### ariaCloseButtonLabel

> **ariaCloseButtonLabel**: `string`

Defined in: [core/src/components/modal/modal.ts:43](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L43)

Value of the aria-label attribute to put on the close button.

##### Default Value

`'Close'`

***

#### backdrop

> **backdrop**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/components/modal/modal.ts:113](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L113)

Whether a backdrop should be created behind the modal.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### backdropClass

> **backdropClass**: `string`

Defined in: [core/src/components/modal/modal.ts:50](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L50)

Classes to add on the backdrop DOM element.

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### backdropTransition

> **backdropTransition**: `TransitionFn`

Defined in: [core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts:73](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L73)

The transition to use for the backdrop behind the modal (if present).

##### Default Value

`fadeTransition`

***

#### children

> **children**: `SlotContent`\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Defined in: [core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts:26](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L26)

Body of the modal.

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`

Defined in: [core/src/components/commonProps.ts:10](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/commonProps.ts#L10)

CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### closeButton

> **closeButton**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/components/modal/modal.ts:57](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L57)

Whether to display the close button.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### closeOnOutsideClick

> **closeOnOutsideClick**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/components/modal/modal.ts:130](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L130)

Whether the modal should be closed when clicking on the viewport outside the modal.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### container

> **container**: `null` \| [`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)

Defined in: [core/src/components/modal/modal.ts:69](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L69)

Which element should contain the modal and backdrop DOM elements.
If it is not null, the modal and backdrop DOM elements are moved to the specified container.
Otherwise, they stay where the widget is located.

##### Default Value

```ts
typeof window !== 'undefined' ? document.body : null
```

***

#### contentData

> **contentData**: `Data`

Defined in: [core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts:22](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L22)

Data to use in content slots

***

#### footer

> **footer**: `SlotContent`\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Defined in: [core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts:31](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L31)

Footer of the modal.

***

#### fullscreen

> **fullscreen**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts:53](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L53)

Option to create a fullscreen modal, according to the bootstrap documentation.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### header

> **header**: `SlotContent`\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Defined in: [core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts:36](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L36)

Header of the modal. The default header includes [title](#modalprops-title).

***

#### modalTransition

> **modalTransition**: `TransitionFn`

Defined in: [core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts:80](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L80)

The transition to use for the modal.

##### Default Value

`fadeTransition`

***

#### onBeforeClose

> **onBeforeClose**: (`event`) => `void`

Defined in: [core/src/components/modal/modal.ts:153](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L153)

Event to be triggered when the modal is about to be closed (i.e. the ModalApi.close\|close method was called).

##### Parameters

###### event

[`ModalBeforeCloseEvent`](#modalbeforecloseevent)

event giving access to the argument given to the ModalApi.close\|close method and allowing
to cancel the close process.

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onHidden

> **onHidden**: () => `void`

Defined in: [core/src/components/modal/modal.ts:175](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L175)

Event to be triggered when the transition is completed and the modal is not visible.

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onShown

> **onShown**: () => `void`

Defined in: [core/src/components/modal/modal.ts:185](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L185)

Event to be triggered when the transition is completed and the modal is visible.

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onVisibleChange

> **onVisibleChange**: (`visible`) => `void`

Defined in: [core/src/components/modal/modal.ts:165](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L165)

Event to be triggered when the visible property changes.

##### Parameters

###### visible

`boolean`

new value of the visible propery

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### structure

> **structure**: `SlotContent`\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Defined in: [core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts:42](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L42)

Structure of the modal.
The default structure uses [header](#modalprops-header), [children](#modalprops-children) and [footer](#modalprops-footer).

***

#### title

> **title**: `SlotContent`\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Defined in: [core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts:47](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L47)

Title of the modal.

***

#### visible

> **visible**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/components/modal/modal.ts:76](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L76)

Whether the modal should be visible when the transition is completed.

##### Default Value

`false`

## interface_ModalState
Defined in: [core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts:61](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L61)

Represents the state of a modal component.

### Type Parameters

• **Data**

The type of the data associated with the modal.

### Properties

#### ariaCloseButtonLabel

> **ariaCloseButtonLabel**: `string`

Defined in: [core/src/components/modal/modal.ts:43](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L43)

Value of the aria-label attribute to put on the close button.

`'Close'`

***

> **backdropClass**: `string`

Defined in: [core/src/components/modal/modal.ts:50](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L50)

Classes to add on the backdrop DOM element.

`''`

***

#### backdropHidden

> **backdropHidden**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/components/modal/modal.ts:196](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L196)

Whether to display the close button.

`true`

Which element should contain the modal and backdrop DOM elements.
If it is not null, the modal and backdrop DOM elements are moved to the specified container.

```ts
typeof window !== 'undefined' ? document.body : null
```

***

#### contentData

> **contentData**: `Data`

Defined in: [core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts:22](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L22)

Data to use in content slots

***

#### footer

> **footer**: `SlotContent`\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Defined in: [core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts:31](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core-bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.ts#L31)

The default structure uses [header](#modalprops-header), [children](#modalprops-children) and [footer](#modalprops-footer).
